name: JAFLL
description:
(Just A Freezed Lost Lumberjack)

I'm a 16 years old Italian student and this is my first "finished" game. I had a lot of fun developing this game and I know it's far from perfect. I'd really appreciate if you could write a comment here or on the Ludum Dare page saying  what i should improve. Thanks in advance.

In JAFLL you play as a lumberjack lost in a procedurally generated forest who has heard an helicopter near by so he light a fire to be spotted more easily and not to freeze to death. You have to collect wood in order to KEEP THE FIRE ALIVE. (Made for Ludum Dare 46)
